column4: why am I getting these annoying "The following packages have unmet dependencies:
realplayer: Depends: libstdc++5 (>= 1:3.3.4-1) but it is not going to be installed

-- is it because of bad repositories?
2005-10-27T13:17:00.000Z	[Chameleon] 	wolden	you need to add some repositories, yes. The repos you are using are not necessarily bad tho.
